X.description: The distance between the left edge of a control and the left edge of its parent container (screen if no parent container)

Y.description: The distance between the top edge of a control and the top edge of the parent container (screen if no parent container)

Height.description: The distance between a control's top and bottom edges.

AutoHeight.description: Whether a control automatically changes its height to fit the size of its contents, given a fixed width.

Width.description: The distance between a control's left and right edges.

WidthFit.description: Whether a control automatically grows horizontally to fill any empty space of a container control such as an Edit form control.

Padding.description: The distance between the text on an import or export button and the edges of that button.

PaddingBottom.description: The distance between text in a control and the bottom edge of that control.

PaddingLeft.description: The distance between text in a control and the left edge of that control.

PaddingRight.description: The distance between text in a control and the right edge of that control.

PaddingTop.description: The distance between text in a control and the top edge of that control.

RadiusBottomLeft.description: The degree to which the bottom-left corner of a control is rounded.

RadiusBottomRight.description: The degree to which the bottom-right corner of a control is rounded.

RadiusTopLeft.description: The degree to which the top-left corner of a control is rounded.

RadiusTopRight.description: The degree to which the top-right corner of a control is rounded.

Font.description: The name of the family of fonts in which text appears.

FontWeight.description: The weight of the text in a control: Bold, Semibold, Normal, or Lighter.

Italic.description: Whether the text in a control is italic.

Size.description: The font size of the text that appears on a control.

Strikethrough.description: Whether a line appears through the text that appears on a control.

Underline.description: Whether a line appears under the text that appears on a control.

Align.description: The location of text in relation to the horizontal center of its control.

LineHeight.description: The distance between, for example, lines of text or items in a list.

VerticalAlign.description: The location of text on a control in relation to the vertical center of that control.

BackgroundImage.description: The name of an image file that appears in the background of a screen.

Image.description: The name of the image that appears in an image, audio, or microphone control.

ImagePosition.description: The position (Fill, Fit, Stretch, Tile, or Center) of an image in a screen or a control if it isn't the same size as the image.

Default.description: The initial value of a control before it is changed by the user.

DelayOutput.description: Set to true to delay action during text input.

DisplayMode.description: Values can be Edit, View, or Disabled. Configures whether the control allows user input (Edit), only displays data (View) or is disabled (Disabled).

Items.description: The source of data that appears in a control such as a gallery, a list, or a chart.

OnChange.description: Actions to perform when the user changes the value of a control (for example, by adjusting a slider).

OnSelect.description: Actions to perform when the user taps or clicks a control.

Reset.description: Whether a control reverts to its default value. Also see the Reset function.

Text.description: Text that appears on a control or that the user types into a control.

Tooltip.description: Explanatory text that appears when the user hovers over a control.

Value.description: The value of an input control.

Visible.description: Whether a control appears or is hidden.

BorderColor.description: The color of a control's border.

BorderStyle.description: Whether a control's border is Solid, Dashed, Dotted, or None.

BorderThickness.description: The thickness of a control's border.

Color.description: The color of text in a control.

DropShadow.description: Adds shadow effects around the control.

Fill.description: The background color of a control.

FocusedBorderColor.description: The color of a control's border when it has focus.

FocusedBorderThickness.description: The thickness of a control's border when it has focus.

DisabledBorderColor.description: The color of a control's border if the control's DisplayMode property is set to Disabled.

DisabledColor.description: The color of text in a control if its DisplayMode property is set to Disabled.

DisabledFill.description: The background color of a control if its DisplayMode property is set to Disabled.

HoverBorderColor.description: The color of a control's border when the user keeps the mouse pointer on that control.

HoverColor.description: The color of the text in a control when the user keeps the mouse pointer on it.

HoverFill.description: The background color of a control when the user keeps the mouse pointer on it.

PressedBorderColor.description: The color of a control's border when the user taps or clicks that control.

PressedColor.description: The color of text in a control when the user taps or clicks that control.

PressedFill.description: The background color of a control when the user taps or clicks that control.

SelectionColor.description: The text color of a selected item or items in a list or the color of the selection tool in a pen control.

SelectionFill.description: The background color of a selected item or items in a list or a selected area of a pen control.
